site.name: Kavir Kaycee
site.description: Hi! I am Kavir, a Product Manager, Builder, Startup Advisor, and Writer. This is my small corner of the internet.

title:
I'm a versatile product manager with 8+ years of product + founder experience at Tier 1 VC (Accel, Sequoia, CapitalG) funded startups.

Currently advising an AI Storyboarding startup that‚Äôs raising a seed round.

Most recently, I was a senior product manager at Hashnode ‚Äî Accel funded blogging platform with 3M MAUs. Startup advisor at 3 startups, run a couple of newsletters ‚Äî The Discourse (5000 + subs) and No-Code Shots (2000+ subs).

In the past, I‚Äôve been an ex-founder of an HR tech venture, and as an SPM at CarDekho (now valued at $1B+), I helped build a 0-1 platform to disburse 3000+ loans valued at $12M (currently $60M monthly)

I consider myself a master generalist with key skills including product management, writing, community, and growth. 

ISB alum (2015), On Deck Fellow (2021)
Blogging platform and community for developers (Accel and Sequoia Surge backed)

Defined the comprehensive product roadmap for Hashnode in 2023 aligning with business goals and by collaborating with key stakeholders like the founders, engineering leads, designers, and marketing team
Shipped major revamps including a new homepage redesign, more personalized feed, sign-up modals, and discussions to increase new sign-ups growth rate by 80% from 9% to 16%

More features shipped: Import newsletter subscribers, community likes, following feed, recommended blogs and tags, AI writing features, onboarding emails, AI chat with article (beta), Command bar (beta), Block-based editor (beta)
Led the product management function from conceptualizing the product roadmap, writing product specs, wireframing, acceptance criteria, project management, review, launch
Collaborated with the marketing and community teams and handled product feature marketing by coordinating social launches, writing blogs, X threads, LinkedIn posts, and creating demo videos
Worked on several high-impact side projects that involved writing and building an audience and creating no-code apps for social causes

During India's devastating COVID-19 second wave, I worked with two online communities with 200+ volunteers to build an app that helped 150K people get access to life-saving resources like oxygen, beds, and medicines in time.
i
Built a no-code app in 2 days to help connect people to life-saving resources including hospital beds, medicines, oxygen, mental health experts, and more

Mind Health is an app that helps you improve your mental well-being by practicing mindfulness and challenging negative thinking by identifying distortions.
i
Illustrated designs for 10 cognitive distortions and created an app in Glide to help users identify faulty thinking patterns and challenge negative thinking
Added guided meditations to help users practice mindfulness meditations
In 2023, I updated the app to use AI to identify distortions, and provide more specificity to gratitude and visualization exercises.
Product Management, Productivity, and Wellness templates
